title: Ralston's Goat
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant in downtown where one of the owners is vegan. Features a full coffee bar and plenty of open seating. The opposite side of the restaurant, which is horseshoe-shaped, has a full beer, wine, and liquor bar. Low-key scene throughout. Menu always has vegan options and items that can be made vegan.
